channel.title: Apple Pie Physics
channel.description: Recent content on Apple Pie Physics

item.title: Motion in One Dimension
item.description: A Mysterious Space Train One day we discovered a train traveling through the vast emptiness of space at at low speed. No one knows where it came from and no one knows where it’s going. We’ve sent a team of scientists to find out more about the train and they’ve been living on board for several weeks now. As far as everyone can tell the velocity of the train is constant and the track along which the train travels is perfectly straight.
